testcase.name: Create a new client profile with personal details
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I create a profile with my personal details including age and fitness goals.skipped Then my personal details should be saved successfully in my profile.........skipped

testcase.name: Update personal details in my profile
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I update my personal details such as age and fitness goals.............skipped Then my updated personal details should be saved successfully in my profile.skipped

testcase.name: Set dietary preferences in my profile
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I set my dietary preferences or restrictions (e.g., vegetarian, gluten-free).skipped Then my dietary preferences should be saved successfully in my profile......skipped

testcase.name: Edit dietary preferences or restrictions
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I edit my dietary preferences or restrictions (e.g., add lactose intolerance).skipped Then my edited dietary preferences should be updated successfully in my profile.skipped

testcase.name: View personal details and dietary preferences
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I view my profile......................................................skipped Then I should be able to see my personal details, fitness goals, and dietary preferences.skipped

testcase.name: Attempt to create a profile with invalid details
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I attempt to create a profile with invalid details such as age = "abc".skipped Then I should see an error message indicating invalid input.................skipped And my profile should not be saved..........................................skipped

testcase.name: Attempt to create a profile with missing mandatory details
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I attempt to create a profile without providing my age.................skipped Then I should see an error message indicating that age is required..........skipped And my profile should not be saved..........................................skipped

testcase.name: Delete my profile
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I choose to delete my profile..........................................skipped Then my profile should be removed from the system...........................skipped And I should no longer be able to access my account.........................skipped

testcase.name: Unauthorized access to another client's profile
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I attempt to access another client's profile...........................skipped Then I should receive an error message indicating insufficient permissions..skipped And I should not be able to view or edit their profile......................skipped

testcase.name: Approve New Instructor
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as an admin............................................undefined And there is a pending instructor registration..............................skipped When I review the registration details......................................skipped And I approve the new instructor registration...............................skipped Then the instructor should be added to the system as an active user.........skipped And I should see a success message confirming the approval..................skipped

testcase.name: Reject New Instructor
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as an admin............................................undefined And there is a pending instructor registration..............................skipped When I review the registration details......................................skipped And I reject the new instructor registration................................skipped Then the instructor should not be added to the system.......................skipped And I should see a rejection message confirming the action..................skipped

testcase.name: View Pending Instructor Registrations
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as an admin............................................undefined When I navigate to the "Pending Registrations" section......................skipped Then I should see a list of all pending instructor registrations............skipped And I should be able to review the details of each registration.............skipped

testcase.name: Notify Instructor After Approval
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as an admin............................................undefined And I approve a new instructor registration.................................skipped When the registration is approved...........................................skipped Then the instructor should receive a notification email confirming their approval.skipped And I should see a message confirming the email has been sent...............skipped

testcase.name: Notify Instructor After Rejection
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as an admin............................................undefined And I reject a new instructor registration..................................skipped When the registration is rejected...........................................skipped Then the instructor should receive a notification email about the rejection.skipped And I should see a message confirming the rejection email has been sent.....skipped

testcase.name: Approve a Submitted Fitness Tip
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as an admin............................................undefined When I approve a submitted fitness tip titled "5-Minute Stretching Routine".skipped Then the tip "5-Minute Stretching Routine" should be publicly visible on the platform.skipped

testcase.name: Reject a Submitted Fitness Tip
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as an admin............................................undefined When I reject a submitted fitness tip titled "5-Minute Stretching Routine" with reason "Lack of sufficient details".skipped Then the submitter should receive a notification "Lack of sufficient details".skipped And the tip "5-Minute Stretching Routine" should not be publicly visible....skipped

testcase.name: Delete a Publicly Visible Fitness Tip
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as an admin............................................undefined And the fitness tip "Beginner Yoga Postures" is publicly visible............skipped When I delete the fitness tip "Beginner Yoga Postures"......................skipped Then the tip "Beginner Yoga Postures" should no longer be visible on the platform.skipped

testcase.name: View Feedback for a Fitness Tip
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as an admin............................................undefined When I view feedback for the fitness tip titled "Home Workout Plan".........skipped Then I should see all user comments and ratings for "Home Workout Plan".....skipped

testcase.name: Remove Inappropriate Feedback
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as an admin............................................undefined And there is a feedback comment "Inappropriate language" on the fitness tip titled "Healthy Morning Routine".skipped When I remove the inappropriate feedback on "Healthy Morning Routine".......skipped Then the feedback should no longer be visible under the "Healthy Morning Routine" tip.skipped

testcase.name: Respond to a Feedback Question
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as an admin............................................undefined And there is a feedback question "Can I do this routine with back pain?" on the fitness tip "5-Minute Stretching Routine".skipped When I respond to the feedback with "Please consult a physician before attempting.".skipped Then my response should be visible under the feedback question..............skipped

testcase.name: Rate a completed program
testcase.system-out: Given I have completed a program............................................undefined When I rate the program with a score of 5 stars.............................skipped Then the rating should be saved successfully................................skipped And I should be able to view my rating on the program page..................skipped

testcase.name: Write a review for a completed program
testcase.system-out: Given I have completed a program............................................undefined When I write a review with the content "Great program, helped me lose weight".skipped Then the review should be saved successfully................................skipped And I should be able to view my review on the program page..................skipped

testcase.name: Submit a suggestion for improvement to an instructor
testcase.system-out: Given I have completed a program............................................undefined When I submit a suggestion with the content "Would love to have more flexibility in the schedule".skipped Then the suggestion should be saved successfully............................skipped And the instructor should be notified of my suggestion......................skipped

testcase.name: View all ratings and reviews for a completed program
testcase.system-out: Given I have completed a program............................................undefined When I view the program page................................................skipped Then I should be able to see all ratings and reviews from other clients.....skipped

testcase.name: Edit my review for a completed program
testcase.system-out: Given I have completed a program............................................undefined And I have already written a review.........................................skipped When I edit my review to change the content to "Excellent program, very helpful".skipped Then my review should be updated successfully...............................skipped And I should be able to see the updated review on the program page..........skipped

testcase.name: Submit a negative or inappropriate rating
testcase.system-out: Given I have completed a program............................................undefined When I rate the program with a score of 1 star and a comment "Terrible, didn't help me at all".skipped Then the rating should be flagged for review by the system..................skipped And I should be notified that my rating is under review.....................skipped

testcase.name: Write an inappropriate review
testcase.system-out: Given I have completed a program............................................undefined When I write a review with content "This program was garbage!"..............skipped Then the review should be flagged as inappropriate..........................skipped And I should be notified that my review has been rejected due to inappropriate content.skipped

testcase.name: Submit a duplicate review or rating
testcase.system-out: Given I have already rated a program with 5 stars...........................undefined When I try to submit the same 5-star rating again...........................skipped Then I should be informed that I have already rated this program............skipped And the system should not allow the duplicate rating or review..............skipped

testcase.name: Submit an incomplete or vague review
testcase.system-out: Given I have completed a program............................................undefined When I submit a review with the content "Good program"......................skipped Then the system should prompt me to provide more details if the review is too vague.skipped And the review should not be saved until I provide a more detailed review...skipped

testcase.name: Admin review of ratings and reviews before publishing
testcase.system-out: Given I have submitted a rating and review for a program....................undefined When the admin reviews my rating and review.................................skipped Then the admin should approve or reject the review based on guidelines......skipped And I should be notified if my review is published or rejected..............skipped

testcase.name: Browse programs by difficulty level
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I browse the programs and filter by difficulty level "Beginner"........skipped Then I should see a list of programs with difficulty level "Beginner".......skipped

testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I browse the programs and filter by focus area "Weight Loss"...........skipped Then I should see a list of programs with focus area "Weight Loss"..........skipped

testcase.name: Browse programs by multiple filters (difficulty level and focus area)

testcase.name: Enroll in a program
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I select a program with difficulty level "Advanced" and focus area "Flexibility".skipped And I click on "Enroll".....................................................skipped Then I should be successfully enrolled in the selected program..............skipped

testcase.name: View schedule of an enrolled program
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I am enrolled in a program with focus area "Muscle Building"...........skipped Then I should be able to view the program's schedule........................skipped And I should see the start and end times of the program.....................skipped

testcase.name: No programs available for the selected filters

testcase.name: Attempt to enroll in a fully booked program
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined And the program with difficulty level "Advanced" and focus area "Weight Loss" is fully booked.skipped When I attempt to enroll in the program.....................................skipped Then I should see a message saying "This program is fully booked"...........skipped

testcase.name: Attempt to enroll in the same program multiple times
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined And I am already enrolled in the program with focus area "Flexibility"......skipped When I attempt to enroll in the same program again..........................skipped Then I should see a message saying "You are already enrolled in this program".skipped

testcase.name: Cancel enrollment in a program
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined And I am enrolled in the program with focus area "Muscle Building"..........skipped When I choose to cancel my enrollment.......................................skipped Then I should be successfully unenrolled from the program...................skipped And I should see a confirmation message saying "You have successfully canceled your enrollment".skipped

testcase.name: View program details before enrollment
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I select the program with focus area "Weight Loss".....................skipped Then I should see the program's details including its difficulty level, schedule, and description.skipped

testcase.name: Track personal fitness milestone (weight)
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I update my weight in my profile.......................................skipped Then my weight should be saved successfully in my profile...................skipped And I should be able to view my updated weight in the progress section......skipped

testcase.name: Track personal fitness milestone (BMI)
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I update my BMI in my profile..........................................skipped Then my BMI should be saved successfully in my profile......................skipped And I should be able to view my updated BMI in the progress section.........skipped

testcase.name: Track personal fitness milestone (attendance)
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I attend a fitness program session.....................................skipped Then my attendance should be recorded for the program.......................skipped And I should be able to view my attendance history in the progress section..skipped

testcase.name: View achievements or badges after completing a program
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I complete a fitness program...........................................skipped Then I should receive an achievement or badge for completing the program....skipped And the achievement or badge should appear in the achievements section of my profile.skipped

testcase.name: View all tracked milestones and achievements
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I view my progress section.............................................skipped Then I should be able to see my tracked milestones such as weight, BMI, and attendance.skipped And I should be able to see the badges or achievements earned for completing programs.skipped

testcase.name: Enter an invalid weight
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I update my weight to "-10"............................................skipped Then I should see an error message saying "Invalid weight value"............skipped And my weight should not be saved until a valid value is entered............skipped

testcase.name: Enter an invalid BMI
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I update my BMI to "5".................................................skipped Then I should see an error message saying "Invalid BMI value"...............skipped And my BMI should not be saved until a valid value is entered...............skipped

testcase.name: Failed to record attendance in a session
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I attend a fitness program session.....................................skipped And the system fails to record my attendance................................skipped Then I should see a message saying "Attendance could not be recorded, please try again".skipped

testcase.name: Failure to receive achievement or badge after completing a program
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I complete a fitness program...........................................skipped And the system fails to assign an achievement or badge......................skipped Then I should see a message saying "Achievement or badge could not be awarded, please contact support".skipped

testcase.name: View progress over time for weight or BMI
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I view my progress section.............................................skipped Then I should see a graph or list showing the changes in my weight and/or BMI over time.skipped

testcase.name: Remove weight or BMI tracking
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a Client............................................undefined When I choose to remove weight tracking from my profile.....................skipped Then my weight should no longer be tracked and will be removed from the progress section.skipped

testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as an admin............................................undefined And a subscription plan "Basic" for "Instructor" exists.....................skipped When I update the subscription plan "Basic" with the new price "$30/mo".....skipped Then the subscription plan "Basic" should reflect the updated price "$30/mo".skipped

testcase.name: Deactivate a Subscription Plan
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as an admin............................................undefined And a subscription plan "Premium" for "Client" exists.......................skipped When I deactivate the subscription plan "Premium"...........................skipped Then the subscription plan "Premium" should no longer be available for new users.skipped And existing users with "Premium" plans should retain their benefits until the end of the billing cycle.skipped

testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as an admin............................................undefined When I view all subscription plans..........................................skipped Then I should see a list of all active plans with details:..................skipped

testcase.name: Upgrade to a Premium Subscription
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a user with a "Basic" subscription..................undefined When I upgrade to a "Premium" subscription..................................skipped Then my subscription type should be updated to "Premium"....................skipped And I should be charged $50 for the current billing cycle...................skipped

testcase.name: Downgrade to a Basic Subscription
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a user with a "Premium" subscription................undefined When I downgrade to a "Basic" subscription..................................skipped Then my subscription type should be updated to "Basic"......................skipped And the changes should take effect in the next billing cycle................skipped

testcase.name: Cancel a Subscription
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a user with an active subscription..................undefined When I cancel my subscription...............................................skipped Then my subscription should remain active until the end of the billing cycle.skipped And I should receive a confirmation message "Your subscription has been canceled and will end on <end_date>.".skipped

testcase.name: View Available Subscription Plans
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a user..............................................undefined When I view the available subscription plans................................skipped Then I should see a list of plans with details:.............................skipped

testcase.name: Receive Notification for Expiring Subscription
testcase.system-out: Given I am logged in as a user with a subscription expiring in 7 days.......undefined When the system generates notifications.....................................skipped Then I should receive a message "Your subscription will expire on <end_date>. Renew now to avoid interruption.".skipped
